institute: National Institute of Applied Sciences of Lyon (INSA Lyon), Lyon, France
description: Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Telecommunications Engineering. Enrolled in the final year with an apprenticeship program, working as an AI engineer at SLIB, a subsidiary of BNP Paribas, to gain practical experience and apply advanced AI methodologies in a professional setting.
The course is focused on the study of advanced topics in telecommunications, including wireless communication, optical communication, and network security.
The course also includes a 6-month internship, which I am currently pursuing at Orange Labs, France.
